description: MainActivity.java defines the MainActivity class for the Android app, managing navigation between note list and note details fragments, handling user interactions and fragment transactions.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Activity managing note list and detail fragments, handling navigation, and user interactions.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, and configures bottom navigation.

methods.name: showFragment
methods.description: Replaces the container with the specified fragment, optionally adding to back stack.

methods.name: onNoteSelected
methods.description: Handles note selection, displaying details fragment.

methods.name: onCreateNote
methods.description: Handles request to create a new note, displaying an empty details fragment.

methods.name: onBackToList
methods.description: Navigates back to the note list.

methods.name: onNoteChanged
methods.description: Responds to note updates by refreshing the list.
